text:
THE BEACH opposite JBR draws DSS visitors from around the world Published on : Monday, August 31, 2015
As one of the many exciting leisure destinations in Dubai, THE BEACH opposite JBR has attracted numerous families since the 18th edition of Dubai Summer Surprises (DSS) kicked off on 23 July, under the theme “45 Days of Summer.” DSS 2015 has now entered its final week promising more exciting experiences and attractions for residents and tourists.
Ezequiel from Argentina who has been living in Dubai since the past four years, stated that THE BEACH opposite JBR is a unique destination offering new experiences to its visitors from all over the world. “I live in the JBR and I like this place a lot. Everything is available here such as restaurants and global brands and even a big supermarket where you can buy your everyday things from,” he said.
“I consider this spot to be one of the most charming places in Dubai during the evening. I like being here at the end of a long working day to unwind and take some rest. The fountain and the water installations in the middle of the shopping area are quite attractive and give one a sense of calm and relaxation.”
Nazarena, Ezequiel’s cousin who is visiting Dubai with her family, said: “I like this shopping destination quite a lot. I found plenty of international brands here.”
Abdul Aziz Al Hadaa, who is visiting Dubai with his friend Saad from Saudi Arabia, spoke about the exciting location of the destination highlighting that it is rare to find fun-filled shopping experiences near a beach. He said: “It’s a very nice shopping destination offering a new kind of shopping concept in the Middle East. When I was in Dubai last, the place had not opened yet. I’m very happy that I finally got the chance to explore it this time.”
Saad, his friend, said: “The different experiences that one can enjoy here including shopping, cinema, restaurants and so much more, make it one of the leading attractions in the region and a main destination for visitors from GCC. The sea-view is breathtaking and the shopping outlets are even more unique. I will be returning here one more time before I head back to Saudi Arabia.”
Nazeem Minyar, who is visiting Dubai with his family from the UK, said: “This destination is very unique and offers a lot of recreational services like the cinema showing latest movies, as well as a number of fast food chains, ice cream parlours, and confectionaries, so I never hesitate to bring my family here as it has something to delight every member of the family.”
Nicola Fene, from France who lives in Dubai with his family, said: “THE BEACH opposite JBR offers a variety of services and facilities, like the water park and other recreational activities available to visitors. You can find also different restaurants here that serve a diversity of cuisines.”
